name: Helen Diller Family Preschool
description: Preschool for children of all faiths and backgrounds. Neither your child nor your family need to be Jewish to apply or enroll. They celebrate holidays with our children and families throughout the year as well as a weekly Shabbat. Our program is built on the fundamental premise that children learn and understand their world through play.

howToGetIt: Sign up to take a tour and submit an application on their website.
cost: This is a fee based service.
agency: Jewish Community Center of San Francisco
